tasks.task: Identify crops to grow for profit.
subtasks: Watch video and listen to content.
Note radishes as an easy crop with quick turnaround.
Note lettuce as a quick-growing, high-demand green.
Consider herbs (e.g., basil, mint) for fresh and dried sales.
Evaluate green beans for space-efficient, high-yield growth.
Assess zucchini for ease of cultivation and market demand.
Research potatoes as a staple with potential for profit.
Explore sunflowers for seed, oil, or flower sales.
Listen for tips on market demand research.
Note advice to start with a small plot.
Take note of compost investment recommendation.
Remember regular watering is key, especially for lettuce and herbs.
Be vigilant for pests and use organic methods.
